net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal

Class OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.SlaveState

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.OFSwitchHandshakeState
      • net.floodlightcontroller.core.internal.OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.SlaveState
  • Enclosing class:
    OFSwitchHandshakeHandler

    public class OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.SlaveState
extends OFSwitchHandshakeHandler.OFSwitchHandshakeState
    The switch is in SLAVE role. We enter this state after a role reply from the switch is received. The handshake is complete at this point. We only leave this state if the switch disconnects or if we send a role request for MASTER /and/ receive the role reply for MASTER. TODO: CURRENTLY, WE DO NOT DISPATCH ANY MESSAGE IN SLAVE.
